statements: DELETE FROM events WHERE event_id = 1 AND event_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 100.00 AND available_tickets <= 50;
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Conference%' OR available_tickets = 0;
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE event_id = 2 AND ticket_status = 'sold';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100.00 AND ticket_status = 'VALID';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Meeting%' AND event_location = 'Conference Center';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM tickets);
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_price > 100.00 AND ticket_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE event_id = 1 AND ticket_price > 50.00;
